
# Spotiflyer 

Spotiflyer is a Telegram bot that lets you download songs by simply inputting a Spotify link. It provides downloadable files and direct links, making it easy to access your favorite tracks effortlessly.







## Tech Stack
![Python](https://img.shields.io/badge/python-3670A0?style=for-the-badge&logo=python&logoColor=ffdd54)![RapidAPI](https://img.shields.io/badge/Rapidapi-0057e2?style=for-the-badge&logo=fast&logoColor=ffdd54)

## API Reference

#### Get all items

```http
  GET /api/items
```

| Parameter | Type     | Description                |
| :-------- | :------- | :------------------------- |
| `api_key` | `string` | **Required**. Your API key |

#### Get item

```http
  GET /api/items/${songId}
```

| Parameter | Type     | Description                       |
| :-------- | :------- | :-------------------------------- |
| `songId`      | `string` | **Required**. song in spotify DB |
